content: Children tickets apply to elementary and junior school students.
The ticket may not be used with other coupons, special coupons, discounts, etc.
The expiration date of the voucher: Valid only on the date specified at the time of booking. (*Service is not available during the special nighttime business hours.)
Some contents and events may be suspended depending on the season.
Facilities and events may be suspended / cancelled due to bad weather or local circumstances. In this case, we will not be able to reimburse the cost of transportation to the site.
In case of bad weather or other emergencies, the facility will be temporarily closed. Please check the website of each facility before visiting.
We ask for your understanding and cooperation in the measures taken by facility to prevent the spread of the COVID-19 at the time of visiting.
